data.name: Campus Recruitment Management System

data.name: Balanced - Blog
description: ⚡ Built in Next JS, used GraphCMS as database.
⚡ Data is handled in Graph CMS, and throught frontend, user can read blogs and comment on blogs.

data.name: Brainwave
description: ⚡ AI Saas Application, using openAI and replicate AI for chat, image, video and music generation.
⚡ Used prisma mainly to store points for free convo. added subscription payment method.

data.name: Circle Health Admin
description: ⚡ Working on various APIs, Integration with other systems, CICD etc
⚡ Handling complex health analysis, automation of WA messages, Emails.
⚡ Handling entirely more than 10+ projects with fast delivery and less error rate.
⚡ Handling Complete projects like, Lead managment system, Endorsement Dashboard, CareManagers Admin panel,Integrating DB with other systems and much more.
